settings.text:
Our ice cubes are more than just frozen water - they are a commitment to quality, sustainability and eco-consciousness. We believe that every step of the process matters, from the water we use to the packaging we choose. That's why we offer ice cubes that are made with pure, filtered water and are wrapped in organic materials that are both biodegradable and compostable.

But it's not just about the water and the packaging - it's also about how we store and transport our ice cubes. That's why we offer an organic sustainable thermo bucket that keeps our ice cubes at the perfect temperature while minimizing our environmental impact. Made from sustainable materials, our thermo bucket is not only functional but also beautiful, with a sleek design that complements any setting.

When you choose our ice cubes, you can feel good knowing that you are getting a product that is not only of the highest quality but also eco-friendly and sustainable. We believe that every small step towards sustainability matters, and we are committed to doing our part to minimize our impact on the planet. So go ahead and enjoy your favorite drinks with our ice cubes, knowing that you are making a choice that is good for you and good for the earth.

settings.heading: 3. Enjoy
settings.row_content: Enjoy your order - and make the most of your event

settings.heading: Organic & sustainable
settings.row_content: Our ice cubes are more than just frozen water - they are a commitment to quality, sustainability and eco-consciousness. We believe that every step of the process matters, from the water we use to the packaging we choose. That's why we offer ice cubes that are made with pure, filtered water and are wrapped in organic materials that are both biodegradable and compostable.

settings.title: Sustainable Packaging
settings.text: At Hielo Express, we are committed to minimizing our environmental impact. That's why we use sustainable packaging for our ice delivery. Our packaging is made from recycled materials and is fully recyclable. By choosing Hielo Express, you are making a choice for a more sustainable future.

settings.title: Organic Materials
settings.text: We believe that the best products start with the best ingredients. That's why we use only organic materials in our ice production. Our ice is made from purified water and certified organic ingredients, ensuring that you get a high-quality product that is good for both you and the environment.

settings.title: Purified Water
settings.text: Water is the key ingredient in our ice, and we believe that it should be of the highest quality. That's why we use purified water in all of our ice production. Our water is filtered through a multi-stage purification process to ensure that it is free from impurities and contaminants.

settings.title: Solar Energy
settings.text: Hielo Express is committed to reducing our carbon footprint. That's why we use solar energy to power our operations whenever possible. By harnessing the power of the sun, we are able to reduce our reliance on fossil fuels and move closer to a more sustainable future.
